name: #17 Sengkuni
description:
The Prince of Gandhara and Gandhari's brother. His name means 'Ugly beacuse of his own words". Sengkuni is a cunning warrior and politician, he is the one responsible for the game of dice that lead to the downfall of Pandava, making them lose their Kingdom and Honor. 
As the uncle of Kurava and Pandava, he clearly favor his own blood-niece the Kurava. He will do everything in his power and wit to make sure The Kuravas are the one to rule The Kingdom of Hastinapura.
In the last day of Bharattayudha, Sengkuni fight against Bhima and met his horrible death.
